00043 CSearchDialogResult::CSearchDialogResult(QWidget *parent, const char *name) : QWidget(parent, name) {   
00044     
00045     QHBoxLayout* l = new QHBoxLayout(this);
00046     m_splitter = new QSplitter(Qt::Vertical, this, "result splitter");  
00047     l->addWidget(m_splitter);
00048     
00049     QWidget* d = new QWidget(m_splitter);
00050     QHBoxLayout* main_layout = new QHBoxLayout(d);  
00051     QLabel *label1 = new QLabel(d, "label1");
00052     label1->setText( i18n( "Modules:" ) );
00053     label1->setAutoResize(true);
00054     QLabel* label2 = new QLabel(d, "label2");
00055     label2->setText( i18n("Entries found:") );
00056     label2->setAutoResize(true);
00057 
00058     resultModuleTree = new CSearchDialogResultModuleView(d, "resultModuleTree");
00059     resultTree = new CSearchDialogResultView( d, "resultTree");
00060 
00061     html_widget = new CHTMLWidget(true, m_splitter, "html_widget");
00062     html_widget->setMinimumHeight(80);
00063 
00064     connect(resultModuleTree, SIGNAL(moduleSelected(CSwordModuleInfo*)), resultTree, SLOT(setModule(CSwordModuleInfo*)));
00065     connect(resultTree, SIGNAL(keySelected(const QString)), this, SLOT(updatePreview(const QString)));
00066 
00067     QVBoxLayout* layout_1 = new QVBoxLayout();
00068     QVBoxLayout* layout_2 = new QVBoxLayout();  
00069         
00070     layout_1->addWidget(label1);
00071     layout_1->addWidget(resultModuleTree);
00072     
00073     layout_2->addWidget(label2);
00074     layout_2->addWidget(resultTree, 5);
00075     
00076     main_layout->addLayout(layout_1);
00077     main_layout->addSpacing(2);
00078     main_layout->addLayout(layout_2);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void CSearchDialogResult::setModuleList(ListCSwordModuleInfo&   modules) {
00082     moduleList = modules;
00083     
00084     resultModuleTree->setModuleList(moduleList);
00085     resultModuleTree->clear();
00086     resultModuleTree->setupTree();  
00087     
00088     resultTree->clear();
00089 }

00093 void CSearchDialogResult::updatePreview(const QString newText) {
00094     qDebug("CSearchDialogResult::updatePreview(const QString newText) ");
00095     QString text = newText;
00096     //find text page
00097     QString searchedText;
00098     CSearchDialogText* textPart = 0;
00099     for (QObject* w = parent(); w; w = w->parent()) {
00100         if (w->isA("CSearchDialog")) {
00101             CSearchDialog*  dlg = dynamic_cast<CSearchDialog*>(w);
00102             searchedText = dlg->getSearchedText().stripWhiteSpace();
00103             textPart = dlg->m_searchText;
00104             break;
00105         }       
00106     }
00107     
00108     const QString part1( "<font color=\"red\"><b>");
00109     const QString part2("</b></font>");
00110     const int insertLength(part1.length()+part2.length());
00111 
00112     int searchType(textPart->getSearchType());
00113   if (searchType & CSwordModuleSearch::exactPhrase) {
00114         for (int pos = 0 ; pos != -1;){
00115             pos = text.find(searchedText,pos,textPart->isCaseSensitive());
00116             if (pos!=-1 && !CToolClass::inHTMLTag(pos, text)) { //something was found
00117                 text.insert(pos + searchedText.length(),part2);         
00118                 text.insert(pos, part1);
00119                 pos += searchedText.length() + insertLength;
00120             }
00121         }
00122     }
00123     else if (searchType & CSwordModuleSearch::multipleWords) {
00124         QStringList searchedWords;      
00125         int wordIndex = 0;
00126         QString word = QString::null;
00127         while (!(word = KStringHandler::word(searchedText, wordIndex)).isEmpty()) {
00128             searchedWords.append(word);
00129             ++wordIndex;
00130         }
00131 
00132         QString currentWord;
00133         for (unsigned int i=0; i < searchedWords.count(); i++) {
00134             currentWord = searchedWords[i];
00135             int count = text.contains(currentWord, textPart->isCaseSensitive());    
00136             int pos = 0;            
00137             int i2 = 0;
00138             while (i2 < count) {
00139                 pos = text.find(currentWord,pos?pos+1:0, textPart->isCaseSensitive());
00140                 if (pos!=-1 && !CToolClass::inHTMLTag(pos, text)) { //something was found
00141 
00142                     text.insert(pos + currentWord.length(), part2);
00143                     text.insert(pos, part1);
00144                         
00145                     pos += currentWord.length() + insertLength;
00146                 }
00147                 ++i2;
00148             }
00149         }
00150     }
00151     else if (searchType & CSwordModuleSearch::regExp) {
00152         QRegExp regExp(searchedText);
00153         regExp.setCaseSensitive( textPart->isCaseSensitive() );
00154         int matchLength = 0;
00155         for (int pos = 0; pos != -1;){
00156             pos = regExp.match(text,pos,&matchLength);
00157             if (pos!=-1 && matchLength > 0 && !CToolClass::inHTMLTag(pos, text)) {
00158                     text.insert(pos + matchLength, part2);
00159                     text.insert(pos, part1);
00160                     pos += matchLength + insertLength;
00161             }
00162         }           
00163     }
00164 
00165     //module is Unicode-based
00166     if (resultModuleTree->getCurrentModule()->isUnicode() ) {
00167         const QFont f = CBTConfig::get( CBTConfig::unicode);
00168         text = QString::fromLatin1("<FONT FACE=\"%1\" SIZE=\"%2\">%3</FONT>").arg(f.family()).arg(f.pointSize()).arg(text);
00169     }
00170     html_widget->setText(
00171         QString::fromLatin1("<HTML><HEAD></HEAD><BODY><FONT color=\"red\">%1 </FONT><SMALL>(%2)</SMALL><BR><HR>%3</BODY></HTML>")
00172          .arg(resultTree->currentText())
00173          .arg((resultModuleTree->getCurrentModule()) ? resultModuleTree->getCurrentModule()->config(CSwordModuleInfo::Description) : QString::fromLatin1("<I>%1</I>").arg(i18n("module not set")) )
00174          .arg(text)
00175     );
00176 }
00177 
00178 void CSearchDialogResult::clearResult() {
00179     resultTree->clear();
00180     resultModuleTree->clear();
00181     html_widget->setText("<HTML><HEAD></HEAD><BODY></BODY></HTML>");
00182 }
